contents.text: Welcome to VigLink in San Francisco, where content-driven commerce meets leverage, insight, and automation.
For information on our platform, press 1.
To schedule a demo or speak with our sales team, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo with a sales rep to evaluate the platform.
I run a veteran-focused blog and want to schedule a demo to see how VigLink can help monetize my content.
I’d like to set up a technical demo of VigLink’s API integration and discuss its system capabilities.
I’d like to schedule a demo with a sales representative to understand how this platform works.
I’d like to schedule a demo to explore how VigLink’s platform can help me monetize my physics blog with affiliate links.

contents.text: To learn about pricing and subscription plans, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing specialists.

navigationGoals: Obtain detailed pricing and subscription plan information.
I need to review subscription plans and pricing to choose the best option for my small business.
I need a detailed breakdown of VigLink’s subscription tiers, pricing model, and volume discount structure.
I need details on subscription plans and pricing so I can pick the right option.
I need detailed information about the pricing plans and subscription options for student or academic use.

contents.text: For support and account services, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical issue with my account.
My integration with VigLink isn't working on my website and I need technical assistance to fix it.
I’m experiencing an SDK authentication error with my integration and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I’m experiencing technical issues with my account and need help troubleshooting.
I’m experiencing an issue integrating the VigLink script into my experimental physics website and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing inquiries or account updates, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Update billing information and review my latest invoice.
I want to update my account's billing information and check on a recent charge.
I want to update my payment method on file and obtain the latest invoice for our account.
I want to review my billing statement and update my payment method.
I want to update my payment method and review my most recent invoice for my VigLink account.
